description: This file defines the core data models, constants, and game logic for a Pong-style game, including classes for configuration, paddles, ball, and game state management.

classes.name: GameConfig
classes.description: Holds game constants such as sizes, speeds, and gameplay rules.

classes.name: Paddle
classes.description: Represents a paddle in the game with position, size, and velocity.

classes.name: Ball
classes.description: Represents the ball, including position, velocity, and reset logic.

classes.name: GameState
classes.description: Manages the overall state of the game, including scores, mode, entities, and game logic.

methods.name: _initEntities
methods.description: Initializes paddles and ball at the start or on reset.

methods.name: setMode
methods.description: Sets the game mode (single or two-player).

methods.name: setArea
methods.description: Sets the game area size and initializes entity positions.

methods.name: restart
methods.description: Resets scores and starts a new game.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Performs physics updates, collision detection, scoring, and game progression.
